string-array.name: txtBFIngredients
string-array.item: 3 bananas, peeled and sliced lengthwise and crosswise

string-array.name: txtChIngredients
string-array.item: 4 skinless, boneless chicken tenders, cunt into 1/2-inch strips lengthwise

string-array.name: txtGCIngredients
string-array.item: 2 slices Honeycrisp apple, or more to taste

string-array.name: txtPCIngredients
string-array.item: 1/4 teaspoon salt, or more to taste

string-array.name: txtPiIngredients
string-array.item: 4 small fresh mozzarella balls (bocconcini), thinly sliced

string-array.name: txtSWIngredients
string-array.item: 2 slices (1/2 inch thick) hearty country bread

string-array.name: txtBFSteps
string-array.item: Step 1: Melt butter in a large, deep skillet over medium heat. Stir in brown sugar, rum, vanilla, and cinnamon; bring to a low boil
Step 2: Place bananas and walnuts in the pan. Cook until bananas have softened, 1 to 2 minutes. Serve at once over vanilla ice cream

string-array.name: txtCPSteps
string-array.item: Step 1: Cook and stir the marshmallows, brown sugar, corn syrup, butter, and vanilla extract together in a pot over medium-low heat until the marshmallows are completely melted, 5 to 7 minutes.
Step 2: Put the popcorn in a large bowl; pour the marshmallow mixture over the popcorn and gently stir with a big spoon to coat.

string-array.name: txtChSteps
string-array.item: Step 1: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil and spray with cooking spray.
Step 2: Place egg in shallow dish. Place panko, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, salt, and pepper into a large zip-top freezer bag and mix well
Step 3: Dip 2 chicken strips into egg, then place into panko mixture and shake to coat. Place coated chicken onto baking sheet and repeat with remaining chicken
Step 4: Spray each chicken tender with cooking spray twice
Step 5: Bake tenders in the preheated oven for 7 minutes. Flip and continue to bake on opposite side until no longer pink in the centers, about 7 minutes more. Remove from the oven
Step 6: Set an oven rack about 6 inches from heat source and preheat the oven\'s broiler.
Step 7: Broil tenders in the preheated oven for extra crunch, about 1 to 2 minutes more.

string-array.name: txtCoSteps
string-array.item: Step 1: Preheat the over to 350 degrees F
Step 2: Beat butter, white sugar, and brown sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth.
Step 3: Beat in eggs, one at a time, then stir in vanilla
Step 4: Dissolve baking soda in how water. Add to batter along with salt
Step 5: Stir in flour, chocolate chips, and walnuts
Step 6: Drop spoonfuls of dough 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets
Step 7: Bake in the preheated oven until edges are nicely browned, about 10 minutes
Step 8: Cool on baking sheet briefly before removing to a wire rack to cool completely

string-array.name: txtEgSteps
string-array.item: Step 1: Break the eggs into a microwave-proof mixing bowl. Add milk and salt; mix well
Step 2: Cook in the microwave on high power for 30 seconds. Remove bowl, beat eggs very well, scraping down the sides of the bowl, and return to the microwave for another 30 seconds
Step 3: Repeat this pattern, stirring every 30 seconds for up to 2 1/2 minutes. Stop when eggs have the consistency you desire

string-array.name: txtFrSteps
string-array.item: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F

Step 2: Cut potato into thick wedges. Mix olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, chili powder, and onion powder together in a medium bowl. Add potato wedges and toss to coat evenly; arrange on a baking sheet
Step 3: Bake in the preheated oven, turning over once or twice, until golden brown and crispy, about 45 minutes

string-array.name: txtGCSteps
string-array.item: Step 1: Preheat a sandwich/panini press according to manufacturer\'s instructions
Step 2: Set one slice of bread on a work surface. top bread with 1 slice cheese, apple slices, bacon slices, and remaining 1 slice cheese. Place remaining bread slice on top
Step 3: Cook sandwich in the preheated panini press until bread is lightly toasted and cheese begins to melt, about 5 minutes

string-array.name: txtMaSteps
string-array.item: Step 1:Bring large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 8 minutes
Step 2: At the same time, melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat
Step 3: Add flour, salt, and pepper and stir until smooth, about 5 minutes
Step 4: Pour in milk slowly, while stirring continuously. continue to cook and stir until mixture is smooth and bubbling, about 5 minutes, making sure the milk doesn\'t burn
Step 5: Add Cheddar cheese and stir until melted, 2 to 4 minutes
Step 6: Drain macaroni and fold into cheese sauce until coated

string-array.name: txtOMSteps
string-array.item: Step 1: Bring water to a boil in a small pot. Add oats and cook, stirring, for 1 minute
Step 2: Remove from heat and stir in brown sugar and maple syrup. Let sit until desired thickness is reached, 2 to 3 minutes

string-array.name: txtPCSteps
string-array.item: Step 1: Sift flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt together in a large bowl. make a well in the center and add milk, melted butter, and egg; mix until smooth

Step 2: Heat a lightly oiled griddle or pan over medium-high heat. Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for eah pancake; cook until bublles form and the edges are dry, about 2 to 3 minutes. Flip and cook until browned on the other side. Repeat with remaining batter

string-array.name: txtPiSteps
string-array.item: Step 1: Heat a 10-inch non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Sprinkle shredded mozzarella cheese evenly into hot skillet; cook until cheese is melted, 2 to 3 minutes.
Step 2: Arrange tomato slices, basil leaves, and fresh mozzarella slices on the melted cheese, leaving space for a \"crust\" to form; cook until top is bubbling and edges are browned, 2 to 3 minutes.
Step 3: Remove skillet from heat and loosen pizza with a spatula. Gently slide pizza onto a cutting board; cool for 1 minute before slicing

string-array.name: txtSWSteps
string-array.item: Step 1: Heat a small skillet over medium heat. Butter one side of each of the bread slices with one teaspoon butter. Place one slice, butter side down, in the skillet. Top with the turkey and cheese slices. Place the second slice of bread on top, butter side up
Step 2: When the first side of the sandwich is godlen brown, turn and brown the other side, 3 to 5 minutes per side, or until the cheese begins to melt
Step 3: Remove sandwich to a plate and top with strawberry preserves, or serve the preserves on the side
